item.title: Python Native GUI with Toga
item.description:
Beeware is a package that allows for apps to be written natively in python and then deployed on Android, Mac, Linux, Windows and others. I'm going to break down Toga, a Python native, OS native GUI toolkit. I'm going to start with building a basic button. 

import toga
from toga …
item.dc:creator: Cody Kane

item.title: Downloading & cleaning tweets from a Twitter Account
item.description:
First, you need to get an API key from twitter, to do this you'll need to register for a developer account and follow the steps.

item.title: LabelBinarizer & LabelEncoder
item.description: To avoid your machine learning model blowing up when you feed it data in production, it's necessary to give it numerical values, rather than categorical variables in the form of strings. There are a few different ways to go about this in your preprocessing flow, depending on whether the categories …
